alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:04PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Benton, western Washington and northern Adair Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 903 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from West Siloam Springs to 4 miles northwest of Westville to 2 miles east of Proctor. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Siloam Springs... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Tontitown... Lincoln... Westville... Watts... Christie... Cincinnati... Baron... Elm Springs... Walnut Grove... Savoy... Ballard... Wedington... Gallitin... Rhea... Canehill... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
